document_api_meta.title: Create Activity
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to create a product discount activity or a flash deal activity. You cannot create a coupon activity with this API. To do that, you'll need to go to the seller center or the seller app. To update the products or SKUs included in the activity, use [Update Activity Product](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650d32c42aaa3602b86ccb5c).

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: title
request_body_param.desc: Unique name across all your activities. The length must not exceed 50 characters.

request_body_param.name: activity_type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of activities.
Possible enumerations:
- `FIXED_PRICE`: product discount activity with fixed price.
- `DIRECT_DISCOUNT`: product discount activities with percentage off.
- `FLASHSALE`: flash sale activity.
- `SHIPPING_DISCOUNT`: shipping fee discount.
- `BUY_MORE_SAVE_MORE`: Buy more save more discount.

request_body_param.name: product_level
request_body_param.desc:
Activity product dimension, values are:
​- PRODUCT: Promotion activity applies at the product (SPU) level. Any and all SKUs that are part of this product will be subject to the promotion.
​- VARIATION: Promotion activity only applies to specified SKUs.
​- SHOP: Promotion activity applies to all products in the shop.
When `activity_type` is `SHIPPING_DISCOUNT`, the `product_level` can not be `VARIATION`.
To set the products or SKUs covered by the activity, use [Update Activity Product](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650d32c42aaa3602b86ccb5c).

request_body_param.name: duration_type
request_body_param.desc:
The effective time type of the current activity
- NORMAL:  `begin_time` and `end_time` must be filled
- INDEFINITE: `begin_time` and `end_time` aren't required, and the promotion will be a long-term activity which runs indefinitely. 
1.  `INDEFINITE` is only valid when `activity_type` is `SHIPPING_DISCOUNT`,
2. If `duration_type` is `INDEFINITE`, `start_time` and `end_time` should be 0
Default: NORMAL

request_body_param.name: begin_time
request_body_param.desc: Activity start time. UNIX timestamp. The value must be greater than the value of the current time.

request_body_param.name: end_time
request_body_param.desc: Activity end time. UNIX timestamp.

request_body_param.name: participation_limit
request_body_param.desc: The number of times a buyer can participate in the promotion.

request_body_param.name: ^type
request_body_param.desc:
Determines whether the promotion activity limits the number of times each buyer can receive its benefit. e.g.:
- `BUYER_NO_LIMIT`: No limit for buyer​s. Buyers can benefit from this promotion across multiple orders.
- `BUYER_LIMIT_ONLY_ONE`: Buyers can benefit from this promotion activity for no more than one order.
​Default: `BUYER_NO_LIMIT`

request_body_param.name: discount
request_body_param.desc: Discount information.

request_body_param.name: ^shipping_discount
request_body_param.desc: Shipping Discount

request_body_param.name: ^^threshold_type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of purchase criteria. Possible enumerations are:
- `NO_THRESHOLD`: No minimum purchase criteria. 
- `MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY`: Buyer must meet or exceed the minimum spend criteria with eligible products.
- `MINIMAL_ORDER_AMOUNT`: Buyer must meet or exceed the minimum spend criteria with eligible order.
`MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY` and `MINIMAL_ORDER_AMOUNT` can only be set when `product_level==SHOP`.

request_body_param.name: ^^threshold_value
request_body_param.desc:
The purchase threshold of the discount, based on the threshold type, e.g., "3". Determined by user.
- When `threshold_type==NO_THRESHOLD`, this value is not required.
- When `threshold_type==MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY`, buyer must purchase at least the specified number of eligible products (e.g. must purchase 3 or more eligible products to receive the benefit). If it represents a quantity, it must be an integer.
- When `threshold_type==MINIMAL_ORDER_AMOUNT`, the eligible product subtotal for the buyer's order must meet or exceed the specified order value in local currency (e.g. buyer's order subtotal must be at least $3 to receive the benefit). If it represents an order value, it must be limited to two decimal places.

request_body_param.name: ^^type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of benefit awarded by the promotion activity. 
-When `FREE_SHIPPING`, the buyer's cost of shipping is reduced to zero.
​-When `DISCOUNT_SHIPPING_FEE`, the discount is reduced by the value specified in `shipping_discount.value`.

request_body_param.name: ^^value
request_body_param.desc:
Value of the discount.
- When `discount_type==FREE_SHIPPING`, this value is not required.
- `discount_type==DISCOUNT_SHIPPING_FEE`, this value is the maximum amount deducted from the buyer's price of shipping in local currency. 
The value should be limited to two decimal places.

request_body_param.name: ^^shipping_method
request_body_param.desc:
The shipping methods to which this promotion applies.
- When `STANDARD_SHIPPING`: Only applies to Standard Shipping methods, including Economy.
- `EXPRESS_SHIPPING`: Only applies to Express Shipping methods.
- `ALL_SHIPPING_METHOD`: Applies to all shipping methods that the shop offers.
Default: `STANDARD_SHIPPING`

request_body_param.name: ^^inventory_type
request_body_param.desc:
The inventory types to which the promotion activity applies:
- `SELF_FULFILLED`: Only applies to Inventory fulfilled from seller warehouses
- `FULFILLED_BY_TIKTOK`: Only applies to Inventory fulfilled by TikTok from FBT (Fulfilled by TikTok) warehouses.
- `ALL`:  Applies to all inventory of eligible products.
Default: `SELF_FULFILLED`
`FULFILLED_BY_TIKTOK` and `ALL` can only be set when `product_level`==`SHOP` and `threshold_type=NO_THRESHOLD`.

request_body_param.name: ^^area_scope
request_body_param.desc: The (buyer's) geographical areas to which the promotion activity applies.

request_body_param.name: ^^^type
request_body_param.desc:
The (buyer's) geographical area to which the promotion activity applies.
​- `WHOLE`: Promotion activity applies to all areas to which the seller offers fulfillment. 
- `SPECIFIC_AREAS`: Only applies to specific fulfillment areas, as defined in `area_scope.specific_areas`

request_body_param.name: ^^^specific_areas
request_body_param.desc: The list of areas for which the promotion activity applies. The valid values that may be included in this list are dependent on the region of the shop. The list of valid values for each shop region are available here: [link](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67e3b059e7dc4f04a4ff9e09)

request_body_param.name: ^bmsm_discount
request_body_param.desc: Configurations related to Buy More Save More (BMSM) promotions

request_body_param.name: ^^details
request_body_param.desc:
Configurations regarding BMSM promotions. 
A maximum of two `tier`s are permitted. `details.threshold_type` and `details.discount_type` must be the same across all `tier`s.

request_body_param.name: ^^^tier
request_body_param.desc:
`tier` uses 1-based indexing, i.e. the first and second tiers are counted "1, 2", not "0, 1".
`threshold_value` and `discount_value` for a given tier must be greater than that of the previous tier. 
E.g. If `tier`==1 has `threshold_value`==`20` and `discount_value`== `15`, `tier`==2 must have `threshold_value` > `20` and `discount_value`>`15`.

request_body_param.name: ^^^threshold_type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of purchase criteria. Possible enumerations are:
- `MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY`: Buyer must meet or exceed the minimum spend criteria with eligible products.
- `MINIMAL_ORDER_AMOUNT`: Buyer must meet or exceed the minimum spend criteria with eligible order.

request_body_param.name: ^^^threshold_value
request_body_param.desc:
The purchase threshold of the discount, based on the `threshold_type`, e.g., "3". Determined by user.
- When `threshold_type==NO_THRESHOLD`, this value is not required.
- When `threshold_type==MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY`, buyer must purchase at least the specified number of eligible products (e.g. must purchase 3 or more eligible products to receive the benefit). If it represents a quantity, it must be an integer.
- When `threshold_type==MINIMAL_ORDER_AMOUNT`, the eligible product subtotal for the buyer's order must meet or exceed the specified order value in local currency (e.g. buyer's order subtotal must be at least $3 to receive the benefit). If it represents an order value, it must be limited to two decimal places.

request_body_param.name: ^^^type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of discount awarded as a benefit. The value of the discount is determined by `value`.
Possible enumerations are:
​- `PERCENTAGE_OFF`​: Buyer will receive X% off the price of the eligible products.
- `AMOUNT_OFF`: Buyer will receive X units of local currency off the price of eligible products.

request_body_param.name: ^^^value
request_body_param.desc:
Value of the discount.
- When `type`==`PERCENTAGE_OFF`, the buyer will receive X% off the price of eligible products. If the value represents a percentage, it should be an integer.
- `type`==`AMOUNT_OFF`, the buyer will receive X units of local currency off the price of eligible products. If the value represents a monetary amount, it should be limited to two decimal places.

request_body_param.name: ^gift_discount
request_body_param.desc: Configurations related to Gift With Purchase (GWP) promotions. Only needs to be configured for GWP promotions.

request_body_param.name: ^^gift_receiving_type
request_body_param.desc:
The receiving type of gift. Currently only supports one type: `ALL_RECEIVE`
-`ALL_RECEIVE`: All gifts configured in the promotion can be collected.

request_body_param.name: ^^gift_infos
request_body_param.desc:
Configurations regarding Gift With Purchase (GWP) promotions. 
A maximum of two `tier`s are permitted in SEA and UK. Only one `tier` is permitted in US. And `threshold_type` must be the same across all `tier`s.

request_body_param.name: ^^^tier
request_body_param.desc:
`tier` uses 1-based indexing, i.e. the first and second tiers are counted "1, 2", not "0, 1".
`threshold_value` for a given tier must be greater than that of the previous tier. 
E.g. If `tier`==1 has `threshold_value`==`2`, `tier`==2 must have `threshold_value` > `2`.

request_body_param.name: ^^^threshold_type
request_body_param.desc:
The purchase threshold type of discount. Possible enumerations are:
- `MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY`: Buyer must meet or exceed the minimum spend criteria with eligible products.
- `MINIMAL_ORDER_AMOUNT`: Buyer must meet or exceed the minimum spend criteria with eligible order.

request_body_param.name: ^^^threshold_value
request_body_param.desc:
The purchase threshold value of the gift, based on the `threshold_type`. Determined by user.
- When `threshold_type==MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY`, buyer must purchase at least the specified number of eligible products (e.g. must purchase 3 or more eligible products to receive the benefit). If it represents a quantity, it must be an integer.
- When `threshold_type==MINIMAL_ORDER_AMOUNT`, the eligible product subtotal for the buyer's order must meet or exceed the specified order value in local currency (e.g. buyer's order subtotal must be at least $3 to receive the benefit). If it represents an order value, it must be limited to two decimal places.

request_body_param.name: ^^^gift_details
request_body_param.desc: Gift configurations related to Gift With Purchase (GWP) promotions.

request_body_param.name: ^^^^product_id
request_body_param.desc: TikTok Shop product id of gift.

request_body_param.name: ^^^^sku_id
request_body_param.desc: TikTok Shop sku id of gift.

request_body_param.name: ^^^^total_claim_limit
request_body_param.desc: The quantity limit of the gift sku which is involved in the activity. The range is [1, 99999].  If you are updating the value of an existing sku, the value cannot be decreased.

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^activity_id
response_param.desc: A unique ID that identifies different activities.

response_param.name: ^create_time
response_param.desc: The time when the activity was created.

response_param.name: ^update_time
response_param.desc: The time when the activity was last updated.

response_param.name: ^status
response_param.desc:
Possible values:
- DRAFT: Promotion activities with this status are not available to TikTok users.
- NOT_START: Promotion activities with this status are not available to TikTok users until the set activity start time.
- ONGOING: Promotion activities with this status are available to TikTok users.
- EXPIRED: Promotion activities with this status are not available to TikTok users because it has expired.
- DEACTIVATED: The activity has been deactivated by the seller and is not available to TikTok users.
- NOT_EFFECTIVE:  The activity is terminated by the platform and is not available to TikTok users.

error_code_list.msg: A storewide free shipping promotion activity is already active. Only one can be created at a time.
Invalid parameters
Title Length Too Long
Duplicate activity title.
Begin Time Earlier Than Now
The activity period is too short.
The activity period is too long.
FlashSale Period Too Long
Invalid SellerID
Empty RequestSerialNo
ShopRisk Check Failed
ActivityType is not supported.
ActivityVersion is not supported.
ProductType is not supported
Selected `inventory_type` is not supported in your region.
Empty gift sku info.
Gift sku id is invalid, not an integer.
Gift sku repeated
Price of the gift exceeds the upper limit
Eligible products and the gift products must not be the same product.
Number of gifts per tier does not meet the limit
Gift sku is out of stock.
Gifts across different tiers are repeated
Number of gift tiers does not meet the requirement
Specified time is outside of the defined range for this activity. Please check the time range for the activity and try again.
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func promotion202309CreateActivityPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.PromotionV202309API.Promotion202309ActivitiesPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody.SetTitle("DiscountEvent0829")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody.SetActivityType("FIXED_PRICE")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody.SetProductLevel("PRODUCT")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody.SetDurationType("INDEFINITE")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody.SetBeginTime(1661756811)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody.SetEndTime(1661856811)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyParticipationLimit := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyParticipationLimit()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyParticipationLimit.SetType("BUYER_NO_LIMIT")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyParticipationLimitList := []promotion_v202309.Promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyParticipationLimit{*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyParticipationLimit}
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody.SetParticipationLimit(promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyParticipationLimitList)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscount := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscount()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount.SetThresholdType("MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount.SetThresholdValue("3")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount.SetType("DISCOUNT_SHIPPING_FEE")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount.SetValue("10.5")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount.SetShippingMethod("STANDARD_SHIPPING")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount.SetInventoryType("SELF_FULFILLED")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscountAreaScope := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscountAreaScope()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscountAreaScope.SetType("WHOLE")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscountAreaScopeSpecificAreasList := []string{[]}
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscountAreaScope.SetSpecificAreas(promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscountAreaScopeSpecificAreasList)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount.SetAreaScope(*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscountAreaScope)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscount.SetShippingDiscount(*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountShippingDiscount)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscount := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscount()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetails := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetails()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetails.SetTier(1)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetails.SetThresholdType("MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetails.SetThresholdValue("5")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetails.SetType("PERCENTAGE_OFF")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetails.SetValue("10")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetailsList := []promotion_v202309.Promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetails{*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetails}
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscount.SetDetails(promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscountDetailsList)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscount.SetBmsmDiscount(*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountBmsmDiscount)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscount := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscount()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscount.SetGiftReceivingType("ALL_RECEIVE")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfos := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfos()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfos.SetTier(1)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfos.SetThresholdType("MINIMAL_ITEM_QUANTITY")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfos.SetThresholdValue("3")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosGiftDetails := promotion_v202309.NewPromotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosGiftDetails()
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosGiftDetails.SetProductId("1732239744891062847")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosGiftDetails.SetSkuId("1732239787859544639")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosGiftDetails.SetTotalClaimLimit("100")
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosGiftDetailsList := []promotion_v202309.Promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosGiftDetails{*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosGiftDetails}
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfos.SetGiftDetails(promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosGiftDetailsList)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosList := []promotion_v202309.Promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfos{*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfos}
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscount.SetGiftInfos(promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscountGiftInfosList)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscount.SetGiftDiscount(*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscountGiftDiscount)
    promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody.SetDiscount(*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBodyDiscount)
    request = request.Promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody(*promotion202309CreateActivityRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to create and manage seller's discounts and promotions on TikTok Shop.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to create and manage your discounts and promotions on TikTok Shop.
